Talents.Name: Beacon's Wrath
Talents.Description: When this unit's skill is active, Drones have a 10% chance to self-destruct when attacking (and then return to the Operator), dealing 300% of <Operator Name>'s ATK as Arts damage to enemies in a small area

Talents.Name: Precise Redirection
Talents.Description: <Operator Name> and her Drones' attacks ignore 15 RES
